utter_admission_process:
If you are asking about admission process:

The admission process includes submission of application forms,
document verification, and interview scheduling. 
Applicants will be notified of their admission status within days of submission.

For more in-detailed info, you can just contact our page and inquire about our process:
- facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/@SFACCollegeLasPinas

utter_admission_requirements:
If you are asking about admission requirements:

For the requirements, we require you to have:
 - Form 138 (FRESHMAN), or Transcript of Records (TRANSFEREE/2ND COURSER) 
 - Certificate of Good Moral (ORIGINAL) 
 - Birth Certificate - PSA/NSO (PHOTOCOPY) 
 - Four copies of 2x2 ID Picture in white background 
 - Long Brown Envelope

utter_admission_transferee_enrollment:
If you are asking about transferee enrollment:

HOW TO ENROLL TRANSFEREES
For Transferees, visit our school and bring a copy of your grades for evaluation and assessment of school fees.
Office Hours:
MON-FRI: 8:00AM - 4:00PM (3:00 PM, Cut off)

utter_admission_working_student:
If you are asking about working students:

ARE YOU ACCEPTING WORKING STUDENTS?
For working students, we need to schedule a talk with our program head for consideration. 
Please let us know if you are interested.

For an appointment kindly message us on these links below so we can assist you virtually.
- https://www.facebook.com/@SFACCollegeLasPinas
